Review: Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy

From distant lands rests an ancient castle full of treasures and gold waiting just for you. Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy is a new Fantasy themed slot released by Evoplay with a design and gameplay suited for experienced gamblers. With an RTP of 96.02% and high volatility, you can cross the castle walls and obtain wins up to 3,302x your bet. Follow the melody and immerse yourself in this new adventure after reading all the details here.

Gameplay, Betting, and Volatility of Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy

Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy is an exciting slot with 5 reels and 18 paylines that help you win and original cascading reels. After obtaining a winning combination, this mode disappears, and new symbols cascade down. The total win depends on the bet, ranging from €0.1 to €300. Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy also has other features that I will describe later. In the meantime, let's examine the value of the RTP, which in this game fluctuates between 95.92% and 96.02%, with high volatility but increases to 96.19% when you use the bonus buy feature. In Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy, you can reach wins up to 3,302 times your bet, but to do so, you must obtain high multipliers for winning combinations using the Free Spins feature, which I will explain shortly. But first, let's discover the symbols of this medieval-style slot machine.

Theme and Symbols of Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy Slot Machine

The main theme of Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy is medieval fantasy. You will be transported among the ruins of an old castle, which is full of hidden treasures and fantastic creatures. The graphic quality is top-notch, and the music of the slot creates a truly magical atmosphere. Even the symbols follow this graphic line:

· Low-value symbols are represented by Moon, Sun, Swords, Bird, and Crows icons with a bet from 0.1x to 5x;

· The most valuable symbols are the Helmet, Dragon, Gold, Book, and Treasure Chest with which you can win up to 20x your bet;

· The Wild is a special symbol that replaces other symbols on the paylines. It rewards players with multipliers of 2x, 10x, and 20x;

· The Scatter appears only on the 1st, 3rd, and 5th reels. It activates the Free Spins feature;

· The Magician can make you win 2x, 5x, 10x, and 25x for the win multiplier.

Special Features of Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy: Free Spins

· Win Multiplier

When you spin the reels, there is a win multiplier that increases from 1x to every cascade. The magician symbols can also increase it. The multiplier applies its value to all winning combinations. And at the beginning of a new round, it resets;

· Free Spins

With 3 Scatters, players activate a bonus game with 10 free spins;

· Bonus Buy

Players can activate the Free Spins feature by paying 39 times the bet before pressing the spin button.

FAQs
Can I activate a progressive jackpot on this Evoplay slot machine?

No, Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy does not provide a progressive jackpot feature, but you can claim a welcome bonus from Slotjava and enjoy all the other fantastic functionalities of this online slot!

Is there a free spins bonus in the Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy slot?

Certainly. This game offers a free spins feature and multipliers that can be activated with just a few clicks. Also, don't miss out on the other incredible special features like Autoplay, Scatter, and Wild.

What is the RTP value of the Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy slot?

The RTP of the Collapsed Castle Bonus Buy slot machine is 96.02%. You can try to spin the reels for free or with real money after registering at one of the ADM/AAMS casinos on our updated and secure list.
